title: List of internship programs
content: This list is incomplete ; you can help by expanding it .
3 Computer Science and Software Engineering 3.1 Free/libre and open source software(FLOSS) 3.2 Research 3.3 Companies
Internships and Summer Research Opportunities in the Life Sciences for 2016
List of Companies That Don't Use Whiteboarding in Interviews
Google Summer of Code - Write code for an open source project, and get paid by Google.
KDE Summer of Code- An alternative to GSOC
Max Planck Institute for Software Systems
Internship on Cryptology at Indian Statistical Institute Kolkata
Amazon India - Offers internships and full time jobs in on-campus placements through CDC. [ 1 ]
Dropbox - Offers summer internships and full time jobs in San Francisco. Apply at https://www.dropbox.com/jobs or ask someone you know for a referral. [ 1 ]
Jane Street Capital - An algorithmic trading company, apply at https://www.janestreet.com/join-jane-street/internships/
Slack - The group chat service, apply at https://slack.com/jobs/70133/software-engineering-intern
Google - Apply at https://www.google.com/careers or get a referral from someone you know.
Facebook - Apply at https://www.facebook.com/careers or get a referral from someone you know.
Stripe - An online payment company, apply at https://stripe.com/jobs/positions/engineering-intern/
Square - A payment service, apply at http://hire.jobvite.com/CompanyJobs/Careers.aspx?c=q8Z9VfwV&page=Jobs
Rackspace - A cloud computing company, apply at https://uscareers-rackspace.icims.com/jobs/14992/rackspace-internship/job
Enthought - A scientific consultancy company based in Austin, Texas. Apply at https://www.enthought.com/company/careers/software-developer-summer-internships/
List of Summer Careers at JP Morgan
Center for Communication Governance NLU Delhi
Summer REU in Dynamics and Stochastics Travel funding only available for US citizens and permanent residents.
REU in Analysis on fractals, Generating sets for finite groups, and Combinatorics of triangulations Doesn't list US citizenship or residence as criteria for eligibility
Undergraduate Research in Statistical Genetics and Biostatistics Doesn't list US citizenship or residence as criterion for eligibility
REU in Algebra, Probability, Statistics, Statistical Genetics, and Analysis . The program page does not mention any eligibility requirement.
REU Program at Brown University. The program page says that they'll give a travel sponsorship within US and a stipend of $3000 but does not explicitly rule out international students.
REU in Mathematical Biology, Discrete Mathematics, and Dynamical Systems : The program page does not mention any eligibility requirement.
Motivic Invariants and Singularities Thematic Program
Summer Program for Women in Mathematics
Institute of Formal and Applied Linguistics, Charles University, Czech Republic
